content: I don't have the ability to visit restaurants or travel, but i can provide you with information about the bachelor farmer. it is a widely acclaimed restaurant located in the north loop neighborhood of minneapolis, minnesota. the restaurant serves new nordic cuisine and features a seasonal menu that highlights ingredients sourced from local farmers and producers. the bachelor farmer also has a rooftop garden where they grow their own herbs and vegetables. the restaurant has won numerous awards, including a james beard foundation award for best chef: midwest.
